def_en: If something reinforces a feeling, situation, or process, it makes it stronger or more intense.

def_cn: 给予…更多支持;为…提供更多证据
def_en: If something reinforces an idea or point of view, it provides more evidence or support for it.
To reinforce an object means to make it stronger or harder.

def_cn: 为(军队或警察队伍)增加力量（或装备）；向（某地）增兵;增援
def_en: To reinforce an army or a police force means to make it stronger by increasing its size or providing it with more weapons. To reinforce a position or place means to make it stronger by sending more soldiers or weapons.
